title: Don’t miss the first GamesBeat Engage event at SXSW
description: Heading to SXSW? You won’t want to miss the first GamesBeat Engage – an invite-only, salon-style gathering in Austin on March 11.

html:
February 19, 2025 12:18 PM

Heading to SXSW? You won’t want to miss the first GamesBeat Engage happening in Austin on March 11. A new series of invite-only, salon-style gatherings launching during SXSW, these events feature an evening of thought-provoking keynotes and fireside chats from leading game industry voices, followed by dinner and networking opportunities with a curated audience of up to 100 top-tier attendees.

Brought to you by GamesBeat and global video game commerce solution provider Xsolla, the event gives attendees the opportunity to engage with peers, spark new ideas and connect over conversations in a relaxed and fun setting, says Gina Joseph, Chief Strategy Officer at VentureBeat.

“Whether you’re looking for insights or want to build connections, our series offers a top-tier opportunity for thought leadership and collaboration,” Joseph says. “We cover some of the biggest gaming industry decision-makers and visionaries, and we’re bringing them together to tackle the industry’s most pressing challenges and opportunities, while giving our guests a place to build meaningful relationships in a collaborative environment.”

You’ll also enjoy some great Texas hospitality, courtesy of the renowned Franklin’s BBQ where you’ll dig into a dinner featuring their famous brisket, ribs, pulled pork and more following the sessions.

Don’t miss GamesBeat Engage 2025 at SXSW

Date & Time: March 11, 2025, 6:00 PM – 9:00 PM

Location: Franklin’s BBQ, Downtown Austin, TX

Request your invite here.

Agenda

6:00 PM – 6:30 PM

WelcomeNetworking and drinks

Opening remarks by Dean Takahashi and Xsolla

6:30 PM – 7:10 PM

Industry insights from Vivrato, Midwest Games, AppsFlyer and Xsolla

7:10 PM:

Closing remarks

Franklin’s BBQ Tour

7:20 PM – 9:00 PM

Dinner and Networking

Session 1: State of the game industry: navigating uncertainty and finding growth

Speakers:

Adam Boyes, Founder and CEO, Vivrato

Elizabeth Howard, chief advisor – services, Midwest Games

Dean Takahashi, Senior Writer, GamesBeat

Description:

The gaming industry faces a turbulent landscape, from shifting player behaviors to evolving business models. Industry veterans unpack the latest trends, challenges, and opportunities shaping the future of games. How can developers and publishers thrive amid economic shifts, platform changes, and emerging technologies? Join this discussion for insights on where the industry is headed next.

Session 2: The rise of alternative app stores: expanding beyond the walled gardens

Speakers:

Brian Quinn, president, AppsFlyer

Berkley Egenes, president, Xsolla

Description:

As the mobile gaming ecosystem evolves, alternative app stores are gaining traction, offering new distribution channels and business models for developers. In this session, leaders from AppsFlyer and Xsolla explore the opportunities and challenges of these emerging marketplaces, from user acquisition strategies to analytics-driven insights that ensure success.

Don’t miss the action! Request your invite to this GamesBeat Engage 2025 event here.

You can also request an invite to the next GB event happening in Los Angeles!
